name: Visual Culture and Communication
notes: Minimum of 4.0 credits to include CCT109H5, CCT110H5, FAH101H5, and VCC101H5.
Minimum Cumulative Grade Point Average (CGPA) determined annually. It is generally between 2.7 and 3.0 and never lower than 2.2.
Minimum 65% average among CCT109H5, CCT110H5, FAH101H5, and VCC101H5 with at least 60% in each course.
